name: One Link Fast Brain
description:
One Link Fast Brain is a very addictive and fun onet match game. Easy to play and addictive fruit match game for all age. Simply link fruit, and clear all fruits before timeout.
How to play:
1. Connect two matching fruits using three or fewer straight lines.
2. Archive the target in a limited amount of time.
3. Eliminate the fruit pairs quickly can make combos and get extra scores.
